name: Pixel Perfect (Intradom, meowlo)
description:
In Pixel Perfect you can work with a partner to recreate a kawaii masterpiece! Join forces to become a SUPERPAINTER to mix colors and paint even larger tiles. Can you surpass your earthly tethers and recreate all of our works of art? 

Make sure to play in full screen mode for the best experience!

Thank you for checking out our game! We hope you enjoy playing Pixel Perfect!

Game Jam

Pixel Perfect was prototyped during Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 where the theme was "Stronger Together"! We wanted to make a game that emphasized cooperation and characters becoming stronger when fused, and we came up with Pixel Perfect!

Instructions Controls

Player 1 paints with WASD

Player 2 paints with ARROW KEYS

Display reference image with SPACE

Color Selection

Select your color by moving your character into the color palette on the sides of the canvas!

Piloting the SUPERPAINTER

Become a SUPERPAINTER by occupying the same space as your partner; you will stay conjoined as long as you move in tandem. As the SUPERPAINTER  you can color a 3x3 space and MIX colors, opening up new venues which are the key to solving some of our perilous puzzles. To disengage your SUPERPAINTER , move in a different direction than your partner does.
